tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
    review_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  review_score FLOAT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE game_statistics (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    total_playtime INT,
    high_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE player_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date TIMESTAMP,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE games (
  game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_name VARCHAR(255),
  release_date DATE,
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  platform VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  rating INT
)
